home__title: Hi, welcome on my online portfolio !
home__intro__pt1: My name is Charly FLU, I'm a developer.
home__intro__pt5: I built this website to show you my skills and my projects, and most of all, because I always wanted to have my own website to experiment things.
home__intro__pt6: I'm currently working with the company
home__intro__pt8: as part of my work-study program as a analyst developer.
home__intro__pt9: This website still under development ! (I have to update the projects and the skills)
project__chess__desc: A completly working chess game made in Java Swing. It detects checks, checkmates, stalemates, en passant captures, and castling. Also detects if a move is illegal and don't allow it. And more...
project__espagnol__desc: Espagnol Super Facil is a desktop application to learn Spanish, made using WinForm. It's a group project I made for my studies. I was in charge of the structure of the application and the connection between the database and the application.
project__mars__desc: MarsGriculteur is a tycoon game made in Unity. It's a group project made for my studies. I was in charge of the market system and the events, I also designed the map and the items.
project__spotidata__desc: Spotidata is a web application made with the framework Express, using in React for the front end, and Node.js for the back-end. It allows you to get lots of statistics about your Spotify account. This was made for school in a group of 3 people.
project__asteroids__desc: Recursive asteroids is C aglorithm that control a spaceship to avoid asteriods. It calculates recursively each possible path, or stop when it find a path that can go to the end of the screen. Repeat itself with each iteration
career__schwilgue: I obtained my baccalauréat with first class honors, specializing in computer science and mathematics, with the option of expert math and math in English. I obtained it at the Lycée Jean Baptiste Schwilgue in Sélestat.
career__schilgue__alt: College Jean Baptiste Schwilgue at Selestat
career__tabacco: I was a tobacco picker for a whole month as part of a summer job. I discovered the hardness of working in the field and the importance of teamwork.
career__pizza: I worked as a pizza maker for 1 month at Pizza Stella in Krafft as a summer job. I learned how to work as part of a team, how not to get in the way of my colleagues and how to behave with customers.
career__iut__2021: A year and a half of my BUT in computer science was spent at the IUT Robert Schuman in Illkirch-Graffenstaden. There I learned advanced programming basics and advanced mathematics.
career__mtu: I spent half a year on Erasmus at MTU in Cork, Ireland, where I improved my English, and continued my BUT in computer science.
career__hindserhof: I worked as a cook for over two months at the Hindserhof restaurant in Hindisheim as part of a summer job. I learned how to manage a team, work under pressure and improvise with the means at hand.
career__iut__2023: I will finish my BUT in computer science at the IUT Robert Schuman in Illkirch-Graffenstaden. The last year is a work-study program, and Im doing it at a company near Strasbourg
career__iut__2023__alt: Back-to-school party in 2022 in the IUT Robert Schuman
footer__built: Built by Charly FLU using only React.js, HTML and CSS.
footer__thanks: Thank you for reading to the end, I hope you enjoyed this website.
